Stagger.description: Building up enemy stagger meters to create openings for massive damage opportunities.Make sure you maintain yours or else they can turn the tide of battle.

Attitude Stability.description: The heavier the more Stable, the more impact you can take before you stagger.

Kinetic Weapons.description: The jack of all trades, Kinetic weapons are the most versatile and can be used to deal damage from a distance or up close.

Energy Weapons.description: Sacrifices stagger for high projectile speed and Higher Damage, Do be careful about overheating them

Explosive Weapons.description: Sacrifices projectile speed for High stagger, Missiles are easy to predict but gives pressure and Bazooka's may stance you but they Hit hard

Biped.description: Good balance of stats and have the most weight variety for most peoples needs

Tetrapod.description: Allows you to carry more weight and have a higher quick boost performance, While in hover, it negates stances from weapons

Tank.description: Sacrifices most of its mobility for massive amount of defenses and stability, it also negates stances from weapons passively
